questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and creativity
D) Wildlife and animals

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A cat drawing
C) A group of people
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A flower
B) A cat drawing
C) A bicycle
D) A bench

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A chalk drawing of a cat
B) A child playing
C) A flower bed
D) A parked car

What materials were used in the creation depicted in the photo?
A) Watercolors
B) Crayons
C) Chalk
D) Pencils

What colors are prominent in the drawing?
A) Blue and yellow
B) Green, Red and pink
C) Red and orange
D) Black and white

What is the texture of the surface on which the drawing is made?
A) Smooth and glossy
B) Rough and gritty
C) Soft and fluffy
D) Wet and slippery

What does the drawing in the photo represent?
A) A dog
B) A cat
C) A bird
D) A fish

What additional elements are visible in the photo?
A) Trees and flowers
B) Other chalk drawings
C) Toys and books
D) Food and drinks

What is the condition of the drawing surface?
A) Clean and new
B) Worn and used
C) Wet and muddy
D) Covered with leaves

What is the color of the cat’s nose in the drawing?
A) Blue
B) Red
C) Green
D) Yellow

A) Ears
B) Tail
C) Paws
D) Body

What is the color of the cat’s ears in the drawing?
A) Yellow

D) Red

A) Green and red

D) Black

C) Straight line
D) Open

A) Curled up
B) Straight down

What is the overall theme of the photo?
A) Urban life
B) Childhood creativity
C) Wildlife observation

A) Smooth and even

What is the technique used in the drawing?

B) Outlining
C) Blending
D) Stippling

A) New and sharp

What additional colors are used in the drawing aside from the main ones?
A) Yellow and blue

A) Pointed
B) Rounded
C) Square
D) Triangular

B) Horizontal

D) Upside down

C) Tail
D) Paws

D) The drawing is layered on another drawing

What is the overall composition of the photo?
A) Symmetrical
B) Asymmetrical

A) Red
